events.message: The insured submitted a claim reporting a car collision that occurred on a busy intersection resulting in front-end damage.
The claim was classified under Auto Accident given the keywords provided in the customer's initial description.
An agent specialized in auto claims was assigned promptly to manage and oversee the investigation process.
We sent an acknowledgment to the insured confirming receipt of the claim and outlining the next steps for assessment.
The insured was requested to provide the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and any repair estimates.
The insured submitted all required documents including official accident report and pictures demonstrating damages.
The investigation team began reviewing submitted documents and contacted the repair shop for further details.
The investigation concluded that the damage was consistent with the insured’s account and policy coverage.
A settlement offer was proposed to the insured covering all repair costs minus the deductible as per policy terms.
The insured expressed satisfaction with how quickly the claim was processed and the fairness of the settlement offer.
Official approval was granted for the claim following customer acceptance of the proposed settlement amount.
Payment for the approved claim amount was disbursed to the insured’s account without any delays.
The claim was formally closed after confirming the insured received the payment and no further actions were required.
All case files and documentation related to the auto accident claim were archived for future reference as per policy.
